content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; style-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0-beta3/css/all.min.css; font-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0-beta3/webfonts/; connect-src 'self' http://127.0.0.1:5000;
